title: first strike ekko icon, will i get the border if i craft it NOW?
body:
i still have all my first strike hextech stuff, i can craft the first strike icons
but i didn't buy any of the skins then, i would like to buy ekko's when it goes on sale which might be in a year or more
if i craft the first strike icon NOW, or IN A YEAR when i buy the skin, will i get the first strike border?

replies.body:
Unfortunately, you will **not get the loading screen border** if you craft the icon now. The border was intended as a limited-time promo for those who bought the skins and crafted the icons while participating in the [PROJECT: Disruption](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) event.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Hello, unfortunately, all the Disruption Event ended on the 16/08 and it was the limit to craft materials. 

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2016/08/project-disruption-ashe-ekko-katarina.html
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ

"Unlock the First Strike loading screen border for a new PROJECT skin by owning the skin as well as its corresponding First Strike icon by the end of the event (August 16 at 23:59:59 PDT)."
